channel.title: Need Help plz
channel.description:
Ok i wan't to know about the Mauls'r'us server.
How do u go about making a person a member? PLZ tell me =(
i tryed ::makemem ::givemem ::member ::membership ::mem

item.title: Need Help plz
item.dc:creator: @Cloud7Strife Cloud7Strife
item.description:
@Cloud7Strife wrote:

Lol with you’re other commands and if you don’t have any commands then search for

public void customCommand(String command) {

Then put the code under that…

item.title: Need Help plz
item.dc:creator: @Imnotokkk Imnotokkk
item.description:
@Imnotokkk wrote:

so i[quote=“Deamerrr, post:6, topic:235691”]else if (command.startsWith("makemem") && (playerRights >= 1)) { { try { String victim = command.substring(7); sendMessage(""+victim+""); BufferedWriter bw = null; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true)); bw.write(""+victim+""); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch(IOException ioexception) { misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file."); } } }

Thats a working one ^

Ex: ::makememDeamerrr

kick them twice

there you go.[/quote] pure the code thing where?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2008, 01:36:47 pm[/size][hr]** where do i put thatd code u gave me[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2008, 01:40:10 pm[/size][hr]Wow i have lots of typos, Where do i put that code.

Read full topic
